org.xlattice.httpd

Interface AbstractHeader

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EntityHeader, GeneralHeader, RequestHeader, ResponseHeader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDate, AbstractInt, AbstractText, AbstractURI, AcceptCharsetHeader, AcceptEncodingHeader, AcceptHeader, AcceptLanguageHeader, AgeHeader, ConnectionHeader, ContentEncodingHeader, ContentLanguageHeader, ContentLengthHeader, ContentLocationHeader, ContentTypeHeader, DateHeader, ETagHeader, ExpectHeader, ExpiresHeader, ExtensionHeader, FromHeader, Header, HostHeader, IfModifiedSinceHeader, IfUnmodifiedSinceHeader, LastModifiedHeader, LocationHeader, MaxForwardsHeader, PragmaHeader, RefererHeader, RetryAfterHeader, ServerHeader, UserAgentHeader, WarningHeader

    public interface AbstractHeader
    Author:
    Jim Dixon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getTag()
      Returns the name of the tag in canonical form: first character and other word-starting characters in upper case, others in lower case, in the same form as RFC 2616.
      byte[] toByteArray()
      The header as a byte array, including the terminating CR.
      java.lang.String toString()
      The header in String format, including a terminating CR.
